SEARCH
Package Controller

Class LoginAndRegistrationManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.LoginAndRegistrationManager
public class LoginAndRegistrationManager extends Object
This class is responsible for the login and registration manager. It contains the methods that generate random string, do hashing and send post request to the server.
